name: Item Finder
text: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

effect.text: Discard 2 of the other cards from your hand in order to put a Trainer card from your discard pile into your hand.

strengths: Recovers any Trainer from discard pile

competitiveHistory: Item Finder was essential in combo decks, allowing players to reuse key Trainers like Professor Oak or Computer Search multiple times per game.

rulings.ruling: You must discard exactly 2 other cards from your hand to use Item Finder.
You can only retrieve a Trainer card from your discard pile.
